# duration

**Instance Property**

The total duration of the primary item and scheduled interstitial events.

## Declaration

```swift
var duration: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

The duration property takes into account the interstitial event’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerInterstitialEvent/playoutLimit] and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerInterstitialEvent/resumptionOffset] values.

Before loading the duration of the primary item, the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/invalid]. For livestreams, this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/indefinite].

## Inspecting the snapshot

- **currentSegment**: The currently playing segment.
- **segments**: The segments for this snapshot.
- **AVPlayerItemSegment**: An immutable object that represents a segment of time on the integrated timeline.
- **currentTime**: The current time on the integrated timeline when the system created the snapshot.
- **currentDate**: The current date on the integrated timeline when the system created the snapshot.
